metadata.description: Custom Claude Code plugins by Scott Weinstein

plugins.name: sw-feature-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive feature development workflow with mandatory AskUserQuestion tool usage and specialized agents for codebase exploration, architecture design, and quality review

plugins.name: sw-code-review
plugins.description: Comprehensive code and design review plugin with pragmatic quality framework. Includes code review for architecture/security/maintainability and design review for UX/accessibility/visual design
